task.title: Buy Linkus Cloud Service
task.shortdesc: Yeastar provides 30-day free trial for LCS (Linkus Cloud Service). After you've tried the Linkus Cloud Service, you can subscribe and buy LCS for your Linkus server for one year.

context.note: If you buy Linkus Cloud Service during the free-trial period, you will get a discount.

step.cmd: Go to Linkus Linkus Server Settings , click Buy Service.
step.info: The purchase page opens and your PBX information is filled in the form on the web page automatically.

step.cmd: On the purchase page, enter the purchase information and complete the purchase process.
Select the checkbox to accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
